to_do_bot module¶

This module provides tools and code for creating simple ToDo bot for Telegram

class to_do_bot.Memo(message_id: int, text: str)¶

Bases: object

Class representing separate memos

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text data of memo

  • messages (list[int]) – List of messages, related to this memo

  • id (str) – First message contained this memo, used like unique identificator

update(message_id: int) → None¶

Updates messages when memo listed once more

Parameters

message_id (int) – Id of message that invoked memo

class to_do_bot.MemoList¶

Bases: object

Class representing memos associated with particular chat

Parameters

memos (list[Memo]) – List of memos in chat

add_memo(message_id: int, text: str) → str¶

Adds new memo to :param:’memos’

Parameters

  • message_id (int) – Id of message representing memo

  • text (str) – Text data of memo

Returns

Id of created Memo object

Return type

str

get(message_id: int) → to_do_bot.Memo¶

Get memo via message that contains it

Parameters

message_id (int) – Message that contains memo

Raises

IndexError – No memo associated with such message

Returns

Memo associated with such message

Return type

Memo

remove(message_id: int) → None¶

Removes memo from list

Parameters

message_id (int) – Id of message to be removed

Raises

IndexError – No message with such index

to_do_bot.add(update: telegram.update.Update, context: telegram.ext.callbackcontext.CallbackContext, keyboard: telegram.inline.inlinekeyboardmarkup.InlineKeyboardMarkup = None) → None¶

Add memo to list and display it

Parameters

  • update (Update) – Update data provided via API

  • context (CallbackContext) – Context data provided via API

  • keyboard (InlineKeyboardMarkup) – Inline buttons layout

to_do_bot.complete(update: telegram.update.Update, context: telegram.ext.callbackcontext.CallbackContext) → None¶

Marks all mesages related to memo as completed and deletes memo from list

Parameters

  • update (Update) – Update data provided via API

  • context (CallbackContext) – Context data provided via API

to_do_bot.init_check(context: telegram.ext.callbackcontext.CallbackContext) → bool¶

Check if memos present in chat data :param context: Context data provided via API :type context: CallbackContext

Decorator for adding inline buttons

func (Callable) – Function to be decorated

Returns

Decorated function

Sends message with reminder

Parameters

  • context (CallbackContext) – Context data provided via API

  • keyboard (InlineKeyboardMarkup) – Inline buttons layout

to_do_bot.remove_reminder(name: str, context: telegram.ext.callbackcontext.CallbackContext) → bool¶

Removes reminders from queue

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of job to remove

  • context (CallbackContext) – Context data provided via API

Returns

Whether message was removed or not

Return type

bool

Sends start message to user without inicialization of memos

  • context (CallbackContext) – Context data provided via API
